alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 2:01AM PST until January 14 at 3:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts 45 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 3 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds will occur on the desert slopes of the San Bernardino mountains into the High Desert and below the San Gorgonio Pass. Winds expected to peak Sunday morning.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Apple and Lucerne Valleys; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
